markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Draconic Frenzy](/Actions.aspx?ID=768) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon makes one Strike with their primary unarmed attack and two Strikes with their secondary unarmed attack (in any order). If any of these attacks critically hits an enemy, your eidolon instantly recovers the use of their Breath Weapon.
name: Draconic Frenzy

text: Draconic Frenzy Two Actions Source Secrets of Magic pg. 64 1.1 --- Your eidolon makes one Strike with their primary unarmed attack and two Strikes with their secondary unarmed attack (in any order). If any of these attacks critically hits an enemy, your eidolon instantly recovers the use of their Breath Weapon.
